title: Interesting thing I found on Champion.gg about Champ loyalty....
body:
So it turns out that when you sort the champions by average games played by the playerbase...off meta champs have the highest play rates.

Stuff that is usually bad or subpar or off meta like mundo, nasus, trundle, singed, karthas, etc. has the highest loyalty by their respective mains.

Food for thought....

replies.body:
There's usually a good reason people would play a champion like that pretty much no one gives a shit about.
So it's usually mains.
